text: Believe you can achieve your hockey goals and you're halfway there.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: You only reach the hockey goals you aim at. Therefore, you might as well aim at reaching your ultimate hockey goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Hockey Goals Are Hockey Dreams With Deadlines.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Hockey Goals Are Attained Not By Strength But By Perseverance.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Lacrosse goals are attained not by strength but by perseverance.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference between lacrosse success and lacrosse failure.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Lacrosse goals are lacrosse dreams with deadlines.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Discipline is the bridge between your bodybuilding goals and bodybuilding success.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Bodybuilders with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Choosing a bodybuilding goal and sticking to it changes everything.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Have confidence in your running ability, and then be tough enough to follow through until you reach your running goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: To get in the best running shape of your life, you have to do something you've never done.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: On your path to running success, remember to enjoy the journey.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: To attain your running goals, imagination is everything. It is a preview of the runner you will be in the future.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Your running dreams of yesterday are your running hopes of today and the reality of your tomorrow.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: It is never too late to set another running goal or to dream a new running dream.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: If you have the right mental attitude, nothing can stop you from achieving your football goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Football players with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Believe you can achieve your football goals and you're halfway there.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Follow your football dreams and you will reach your football goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Positive expectations are important for your football success because you tend to get what you expect.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: To be a better football player than you've ever been, you have to do something you've never done.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Have confidence in your football ability, and then be tough enough to follow through until you reach your football goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: When you have running goals you have hope and when you have hope you have everything.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Act enthusiastic about running and you will be enthusiastic.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Belief in yourself and your cycling goals is the ignition switch that gets you off the sofa and onto your bike.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Your cycling goals should be out of reach but never out of sight.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Cycling is so difficult when you have to and so easy when you want to.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: On your path to cycling success, remember to have fun and enjoy the ride.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Cycling goals are attained not by strength but by perseverance.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Cycling goals are cycling dreams with deadlines.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Choosing a cycling goal and sticking to it changes everything.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Baseball goals are attained not by strength but by perseverance.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Set your baseball goals high and don't stop till you get there.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Positive expectations are important for your baseball success because you tend to get what you expect.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Believe in your baseball dreams and you're halfway to reaching your baseball goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: If you have the right mental attitude, nothing can stop you from achieving your baseball goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Have confidence in your baseball ability, and then be tough enough to follow through until you reach your baseball goals.
author: Scott Fitzgerald

text: Baseball players with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
author: Scott Fitzgerald
